election.section_1: Explore any election from Merdeka to the present!
election.explore:
This page is designed to help you explore the results for a particular election, such as the 15th General Election in 2022. 
If you wish to explore the full history for a particular candidate or party, visit our Party and Candidate Explorer instead!
election.section_2: View the full ballot for a specific seat

candidate.header: Explore the electoral history of anyone who’s ever competed in an election

party.header: Explore any party’s entire electoral history

seat.header: Explore the entire electoral history for your area
